divs: sighting detailsat the time, i was making a routine delivery in downtown belleville, il. i stopped at the address, and after exiting the vehicle, made a quick scan of everything i could see from my position to the end of the street. it was probably around 9-10pm. the street in front of me ended in a t intersection. there was a home centered at the intersection point, on the far side of the intersecting street. there was a man and a boy in the front yard of this home. above the home i witnessed a triangular oject performing horizontal figure eights. at first i believed i was witnessing a kite with lights or a radio controlled toy. as i watched the object perform the horizontal eights, i began to grow a bit disturbed by the appearance of the man and boy tendning to something in the yard, with no visual signs that they were aware of the object that had at first appeared to me to be part of the scene, small, and assumedly over the house which i had a good estimate of the distance towards at the time. i realized that the object was no toy. it was a black triangle with white lights at each corner of its underside and a red rectangular light on the underside also at about a 2\3 mark from the tip to the base which had been flying this horizontal figure eight pattern with the underside and the lights facing towards me. it came out of this pattern and faced in my direction with its tip pointed towards me and made a very smooth lurch forward. the object was angled upwards a bit, and i could see that the rear of the triangle had a soft inward sweep to it. i began to feel that the object was fairly large and closer than i wanted it to be, but still maybe further away than i originally thought. the object was completely silent. the object proceded to stand straight up in the air, (i.e. a floating silent triangle facing me horizontally rotated its tip backwards until it was perfectly vertical exposing the now perpendicular underside). the object then began to rotate on its lowermost right corner, rotating clockwise, as if someone had affixed the very tip of the craft to a point in space and rotated the entire craft perfectly around that point. it made full revolutions in probably each each half second or so. the craft then angled itself back down to the approximate position it had been in before the manuvre, lurched foward, then back, then made shorter movements left, then right then back to center. i lost sight of the object as it descended behind the treeline which was in the rear of the house and which ran behind several of the neighboring houses. as the craft descended, i had a little better perspective on the size of the craft and the distance, as i could see the lights through its descent below the treeline. it was closer than i had previously thought and maybe a little smaller, as i had assumed it had a higher altitude, but was still quite large for its distance. through the whole thing i couldn't help but feel that i was being watched, or that it was simply observing the ground in its area. i remember at the end standing for a moment and just watching but there being nothing visible of the object. what followed were approximately five black or very dark helicopters flying in loose formation, performing fairly quietly and the lead of which at least i remember as having a massive searchlight on towards the ground. they were flying left to right through the same field of vision, just slightly higher than where the object had been, and passed the scene completely. i wondered later if the craft had moved elsewhere at a very low altitude, turned off all of its lights and hid or camouflaged itself somehow on the ground, or ascended again with its lights out while i was distracted? as strange as it sounds, after the helicopters had passed and there was no sign of the object, i still had a job to finish, so i made the delivery and headed back to work for the next. it took me a while to absorb how anomalous this occurance had been. i thought about reporting the incident to scott air force base but soon thought the better of it.
Summary: Black triangle followed by black helicopters.
